name: nuclide-diff-gutters
author: Nuclide Code Lifecycle
description: Handles rendering UI in editor gutters to show changes. A push-based alternate to the git-diff package

showIconsInNuclideDiffGutter.title: Display Icons in Nuclide Diff Gutter
showIconsInNuclideDiffGutter.description: When enabled, highlights diffs in the diff gutter using icons instead of lines
